title: laning this season is pretty fucking toxic
body:
never before has laning so depended on junglers at least knowing how to pressure things.

if you're not going to gank for me while my lane opponent gets 2 ganks in quick succession pressuring me away from farm and levels, the least you could do is go somewhere on the map and pressure/gank for them instead of lying in position for a countergank but simply just watching me die instead.

this rant brought to you by my very garbage vi jungle from last game.
